society_skills.husbandry.category.title: Husbandry
society_skills.husbandry.healing.descrip: All healing provides an extra 5%% health
society_skills.husbandry.bribery.descrip: Using a Â§6Gold CoinÂ§7 on a farm animal increases affection by 1 and makes it gain affection faster

society_skills.mastery.category.title: Mastery
society_skills.mastery.farming_mastery.d:
Market now sells Spark-Pods and Mystic Willow Saplings.
Harvesting crops has a chance to drop Grimwood Saplings.
society_skills.mastery.husbandry_mastery:
You can now find Animal Crackers and Plushie Capsules in the world.
Wizard now sells Sunlit Crystals.
society_skills.mastery.mining_mastery.de:
Trader now offers the Recycled Core for barter.
Blacksmith now sells Statue of the Moon Dwarf.
society_skills.mastery.fishing_mastery.d:
Fisher now sells the Roe Recycler.
Fisher now sells Needle Bobber and Net Bobber
society_skills.mastery.adventuring_maste:
Guild now sells items to upgrade pets.
Wizard now sells the Enchanting Table.
society_skills.books.category.title: Books
society_skills.books.alias_moss.descript: Mossberries can be found in any season.
society_skills.books.animal_fancy.descri: Increases affection gained from petting farm animals.
society_skills.books.bullfish_jobs.descr: The quality of fish taken out of Fish Ponds scales with population.
society_skills.books.canadian_and_famous: Tappers output double. Doesn't affect Auto-Tappers.
society_skills.books.debt_caverns.descri: Fainting in the Skull Cavern no longer costs a fee or adds to debt.
society_skills.books.first_aid_guide.des: Halves the maximum fee and debt from death.
society_skills.books.frogs_bounty_bazaar: Prize Tickets give double the prizes.
society_skills.books.hitting_hard_and_so: Melee attacks do an extra 4 damage.
society_skills.books.intro_to_algorithms: Mining Lead ore no longer causes Brain Damage clouds.
society_skills.books.no_name_for_the_she: Naming animals grants an additional heart of affection.
society_skills.books.phenomenology_of_tr: Artifacts and Relics are worth 200%% more.
society_skills.books.slime_contain_prote: Incubating a Slime Heart has a chance to give you a Slime Ticket.
society_skills.books.slouching_towards_a: Artisan Hoppers have a +5%% chance to not consume Sparkstone for each day an output took to make. This only applies when harvesting from the machine.
society_skills.books.the_spark_also_rise:
mining any ore drops Sparkstone.
Â§6Requires Mining Mastery unlocked
society_skills.books.universal_methods_o: The Market sells all basic seeds in every season.
society_skills.books.wuthering_logs.desc: Trees have a 15%% chance to drop Fire Logs when chopped.
society_skills.books.the_quality_of_the_:
Quality impacts of non-fish farmer products are doubled.
Â§6Requires Farming Mastery unlocked
society_skills.books.the_red_and_the_bla:
Geodes, loot crates, and Slot Machines drop one more item.
Â§6Requires Adventuring Mastery unlocked
society_skills.books.pond_house_five.des:
Fish Ponds will ask for half the items.
Â§6Requires Fishing Mastery unlocked
society_skills.books.women_who_run_with_:
Plushies will start at 2 hearts of affection.
Increases rates of high quality Plushies.
Â§6Requires Husbandry Mastery unlocked
